sqlQuery.name: ByReferenceName
sqlQuery.sql: select dsp.name from apidbtuning.datasetmodelref ref, apidbtuning.datasetpresenter dsp where dsp.dataset_presenter_id = ref.dataset_presenter_id and ref.target_name = $$reference_name$$

sqlQuery.name: ByDatasetNames
sqlQuery.sql: select name from apidbtuning.datasetpresenter dsp where dsp.name IN ($$data_source_name$$)

sqlQuery.name: ByQuestionName
sqlQuery.sql: select dsp.name from apidbtuning.datasetmodelref ref, apidbtuning.datasetpresenter dsp where dsp.dataset_presenter_id = ref.dataset_presenter_id and ref.target_name = $$question_name$$ and ref.target_type = 'question'

sqlQuery.name: ByRecordClass
sqlQuery.sql: select dsp.name from apidbtuning.datasetmodelref ref, apidbtuning.datasetpresenter dsp where dsp.dataset_presenter_id = ref.dataset_presenter_id and ref.target_name = $$record_class$$ and ref.target_type IN ('table', 'attribute','profile_graph')
